name: M.I. Air Aviation Education
about: M.I. Air Aviation Education, located at Chino Airport in California, is an FAA-approved flight school offering both Part 141 and Part 61 training programs. We provide world-class aviation education, ensuring students become proficient and skilled pilots. Our comprehensive curriculum includes private pilot certification, instrument rating, commercial pilot training, and more. With a focus on safety and professionalism, our experienced instructors guide students through hands-on training in a supportive and dynamic environment. Whether you're aiming for a career in aviation or flying for personal enjoyment, M.I. Air Aviation Education is dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals.
